name: nindo-plugin-chrome
description: This is the unofficial Nindo plugin. You can click on the plugin icon to get to the artist's Nindo page. Currently the following sites are supported: YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Twitter and Twitch. If you found a bug, feel free to report it on GitHub. I am happy about every contributor. This project is licensed under the MIT license. For more information, visit https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT.
author: Silas
